title: Twitter Poetry
publication_title: The Modern Series at the Art Institute of Chicago
content:
<section class="osci-tk-epub-section body" id="body">In this interactive program, writers and artists known for creating Twitter poems, image macros, and flarf poetry responded to GO with a series of works that were shared across various social media platforms of the Art Institute throughout the run of the exhibition. The resulting series of Twitter posts was produced in collaboration with Steve Roggenbuck, artist, writer, and co-founder of the independent poetry publisher Boost House, and collected under the hashtag #GoInternetPoems.

</section>
